author: jerenkrantz
msg: * buckets/ssl_buckets.c: Do even more verbose SSL debugging.

author: jerenkrantz
msg: * context.c
(write_to_connection): Allow the connection callback a chance to be
initialized before we begin to try to write anything to the socket.

author: jerenkrantz
msg: Fix a bug with the serf_default_read_* helpers as they'd incorrectly trigger
the debug tracker aborts().
* buckets/buckets.c
(serf_default_read_iovec): Call into the bucket vtable directly; Fix up
the case when we didn't read any data.
(serf_default_read_for_sendfile): Call into the bucket vtable directly.

author: jerenkrantz
msg: Fix an infinite loop if we get in a boundary where there isn't a line to be had.
* buckets/buckets.c
(find_crlf): If we're going to return SERF_NEWLINE_NONE, update the data
and length pointers to show that we tried to read this data and didn't
find a CRLF in it.

author: jerenkrantz
msg: Add a serf_bucket_response_set_head to allow the response acceptor to tell us
that we won't see an entity body for this request (as is the case with HEAD).
* buckets/response_buckets.c
(response_context_t): Add flag if we're a head_req without a body.
(serf_bucket_response_create): Init our ->head_req field.
(serf_bucket_response_set_head): Set ->head_req to 1.
(run_machine): When ->head_req is set, we should skip the body state.
* serf_bucket_types.h
(serf_bucket_response_set_head): Declare new function.
